name: ARGH!
description:
Ahoy sailors! Welcome to ARGH!, a 3D Battle Royale where you will have to come up with the best strategies to survive.

Navigate your boat skillfully and be ready to explore every nook and cranny of the map!
As you explore, collect and use wisely the various treasures of the seas to get rid of the opposing captains and build a solid reputation across the oceans!
However, watch out for the Oblivion! This scourge sweeps memories away and sinks unsuccessful captains into oblivion... So, raise your bounty to the highest level and build an unforgettable legend!



- Play as one of 3 unique captains of ARGH! and compete against 6 players in a resource-filled arena.

- Explore the various islands and loot their abundant treasures.



- Use these treasures to attack other ships!



- Adapt to each situation! Is fighting really the best option?

- Keep an eye on the Oblivion and its progress to avoid fading from memory.

- Achieve great feats to earn the highest bounty in the Seven Seas!
